plot: Actors join a 3 day army boot camp to learn what it is like to be in the army. 17 actors, 2 real army drill sergeants, war games, automatic weapons, and a tank.
title: Actors Boot Camp
plot_es: Actors join a 3 day army boot camp to learn what it is like to be in the army. 17 actors, 2 real army drill sergeants, war games, automatic weapons, and a tank.
plot_en: Actors join a 3 day army boot camp to learn what it is like to be in the army. 17 actors, 2 real army drill sergeants, war games, automatic weapons, and a tank.
